name.en: Radar system engineering, design and practical Applications
name.ch: 雷達系統工程設計與實務I

department.en: Department of Space Science and Engineering

goal.ch: “雷達系統工程設計與實務分為上下二學期授課，目標為建立同學雷達系統完整理論知識，無論軍事用途，氣象觀測，大氣環境風場監測，海洋洋流觀測等感知雷達系統設計所需具備之基本學理均將涉獵，有助於同學畢業後，未來能夠順利進入相關領域工作。“
goal.en: “The course of Radar system engineering, design and practical Applications is arranged to take two semesters. To give students a whole picture of the radar theory is the main goal, We will cover military application radar, the weather radar, the wind profiler radar, and see surface monitor radar etc. It will be helpful for students to enter related field when they have been graduated.“

outline.ch:
“雷達系統工程設計與實務分為上下二學期授課雷達系統工程設計與實務I:授課內容包含
1.雷達系統簡介
2 雷達方程式推導與實際應用
3天線系統原理與場型模擬
4發射與接收系統介紹
5.雷達訊號傳播特性
6.雷達截面積特性分析
7.雜訊與雜波中目標偵測
8.脈波壓縮技術
9.移動目標指示與脈波都卜勒技術
10.雷達波形設計與匹配濾波器
11剖風儀雷達系統基本原理“
outline.en:
“1. Introduction of radar system
2. The radar equation
3. Antenna system
4. Transmitter and receive system
5. Propagation effects
6. Target radar cross section
7. Detection of target in noise and clutter
8. Pulse compression Techniques
9. MTI ＆ pulse Doppler process Techniques
10 waveform design and matched filter
11. Principle of Wind Profiler radar system“

textbook.ch:
“1. 利用Matlab之雷達系統分析與設計
2. 雷達系統設計之Matlab模擬
3. 雷達信號
4. 俄亥俄大學雷達訓練課程教材
5. 麻省理工學院雷達訓練課程教材
6. IEEE AES學會2009雷達訓練課程教材“
textbook.en:
“1. Radar Systems Analysis And Design Using Matlab.pdf
2. MATLAB Simulations for Radar Systems Design.pdf
3. Radar.Signals.pdf
4. Radar Training Course_OHIO_State2013
5. Radar Training Course_MIT Lincoln Laboratory
6. Radar Training Course_IEEE AES Society 2009“

gradMethod.ch:
“平日作業25％
期中報告35％
期末報告40％“

Buildup and Application of numerical models
Presentation and expression of research results
Ability acquirement of interdisciplinary cooperation and teamwork
